mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_pay_check_fee_result ( create_time, total_num, total_fee, out_total_num, out_total_fee, biz_code, status, check_date, agency_code ) SELECT now(), count(t2.instruct_id) as total_num, IFNULL(SUM(t2.commission_fee_amt), 0) as total_fee, count(t1.instruct_id) AS out_total_num, IFNULL(SUM(t1.commission_fee_amt), 0) as out_total_fee, t1.biz_code, 0, t1.check_date, t1.agency_code FROM t_pay_check t1 left join t_pay_check_waiting t2 on t1.instruct_id=t2.instruct_id WHERE t1.check_date = #{checkDate} and t1.agency_code=#{agencyCode} and t1.status= 1 GROUP by t1.check_date,t1.agency_code,t1.biz_code
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_pay_check_fee_result WHERE check_date = #{checkDate} and agency_code=#{agencyCode}
